meanings.definition: Change the color of (something) by adding different colors.
meanings.sent1: She recolours her drawings to make them more vibrant.
meanings.sent2: The artist recolours the old painting to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: The cat recolours the white sofa with its muddy paws.
meanings.sent4: His laughter recolours the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sunset recolours the sky in shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: The act of changing the color of something by adding different colors.
meanings.sent1: The recolours of the walls brought new life to the room.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys looking at the recolours of the leaves in autumn.
meanings.sent3: The recolours of the rainbow made the children smile.
meanings.sent4: The recolours of the garden were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The recolours of the dress caught everyone's attention at the party.
